section.title: Viewing the Operating System Properties
section.para: View details of the operating system from the Virtual Machine Summary or the accordion. For Windows systems, see Account Policies for the virtual machine.

procedure.title: To View Operating System Properties and Account Policies

step.para: From menu:Infrastructure[Virtual Machines], click on the item to view its Summary.
From the Properties section, click Operating System.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: An expanded view of the operating systems properties and Account Policies displays. This varies based on the operating system.
